question: Which country hosted the 7th ASEM Economic Ministers' Meeting (ASEM EMM7)?
explanation: The 7th ASEM Economic Ministers\' Meeting (ASEM EMM7) was held in Seoul, South Korea on September 21-22, 2017. The 2017 theme is ‘Innovative Partnership for Inclusive Prosperity’. The meeting was conducted under the Chairmanship of the Ministry of Trade, Industry and Energy of the Republic of Korea. In it, 51 member countries signed a joint statement on supporting the multilateral trade system.
